text: Hello, I'm trying to run sample described here <https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/docs/nodeSDK/sample-standalone-app.md>. My question is how to display returned results. In fact, when query is applied "return Avalbytes, nil" in "go" code,  command sends bytes correspondent to "a" parameter back to app.js application. The printed results looks very strange, for instance value of 68 printed with %j parameter (in app.js)  as [54,56] array or alternatively as <Buffer 36,38> without %j.
<@U2RSG61V2> the returned bytes value is saved in a Buffer object, you need to convert it to a string to print, call “toString()” on the buffer object to decode to the string

Hello. I’m learning `asset-mgmt-with-roles` example and I noticed that it reports that certificate attributes are not set corrrectly:
```CN:  Transaction Certificate
extensions: 
   ---> keyUsage : Digital Signature
   ---> basicConstraints : CA:FALSE
   ---> subjectKeyIdentifier : 01:02:03:04
   ---> authorityKeyIdentifier : keyid:01:02:03:04
   ---> 1.2.3.4.5.6.7 : e%3..T~.n..2p..._LV3......G.....g.z.F7..E......w..4...{...6.F...
   ---> 1.2.3.4.5.6.8 : v..~.Q.....!w.N.A[....$..>..E....M~..|7M.%.dh.F|
*client not in extentions*
```
Can you help me to understand how to set certificate attributes correctly?
